art.author: susiecat
art.post: That’s right Darryl. He wants US to live the Word, not just read and know it. That’s why He needed YOU to SAY it…so continue to SPEAK it : “I am MORE than a conqueror!” and remember – You are blessed and highly favored, too!.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
